description: Romania issues 200,000 fines which are said to equal the country's corporate tax take for February.
title: Coronavirus: Romania hands out steep lockdown fines
title_page: Coronavirus: Romania hands out steep lockdown fines - BBC News
maintext: Romanians have to fill out an official form before they leave home explaining why they have gone out, similar to rules in Italy and France. The form has to be presented along with an ID card if they are stopped by the police or military.
